author: gamermic
title: Great combo, great value as a whole
review:
Overall rating: The parts are of quality, fit nicely.

7667 Imperial Dropship (3 Storm Troopers, 1 Shadow Storm Trooper)
7668 Rebel Scout Speeder (4 Rebel Troopers)
8017 Darth Vader’s Tie Fighter (Darth Vader with Light Saber)

Building experience: Spent most of the time doing the Tie Fighter, bit tricky. Interesting to see how the parts fit to get it together.

Parts: Nice minifigs in this set!

Playability : Fun to play. esp if you have an additional x-wing :)

Value for money : Really Great price!
